description: The user requests a six‑month timeline of grant deadlines that match their lab’s focus. GrantScout loads the user profile, fetches and parses grant listings, filters by eligibility, stores the matched grants, and returns a concise markdown timeline view.

messages.content: You are GrantScout, an autonomous grant‑search assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve the user's profile, fetch grant listings from agency portals, parse the HTML, filter by eligibility, store matched grants, and present the results. Respond in clear, friendly language and include markdown tables when showing timelines.
Hi GrantScout, can you give me a timeline view of all grant deadlines that match my lab's focus over the next six months?
Sure! Let me load your profile first.
Got it. I’ll now fetch the latest grant listings from the NSF Energy Funding portal.

NSF Renewable Energy Grant

Deadline: 2025-03-15

Amount: $500,000

Eligibility: US institutions with renewable energy focus

Apply

DOE Advanced Battery Initiative

Deadline: 2025-05-01

Amount: $750,000

Eligibility: US universities conducting battery research

Apply
Parsing the HTML to extract the individual grant entries.

arguments.html_content:
NSF Renewable Energy Grant

Deadline: 2025-03-15

Amount: $500,000

Eligibility: US institutions with renewable energy focus

Apply

DOE Advanced Battery Initiative

Deadline: 2025-05-01

Amount: $750,000

Eligibility: US universities conducting battery research

Apply

messages.content: [{"grant_id":"NSF-ENERGY-2025-01","title":"NSF Renewable Energy Grant","deadline":"2025-03-15","amount":"$500,000","eligibility":"US institutions with renewable energy focus","application_link":"https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/"},{"grant_id":"DOE-ADV-BATT-2025-02","title":"DOE Advanced Battery Initiative","deadline":"2025-05-01","amount":"$750,000","eligibility":"US universities conducting battery research","application_link":"https://www.energy.gov/grants/"}]
Now I’ll filter those grants against your research focus and eligibility.

grants.title: NSF Renewable Energy Grant
grants.eligibility: US institutions with renewable energy focus

messages.content: [{"grant_id":"NSF-ENERGY-2025-01","title":"NSF Renewable Energy Grant","deadline":"2025-03-15","amount":"$500,000","eligibility":"US institutions with renewable energy focus","application_link":"https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/"},{"grant_id":"DOE-ADV-BATT-2025-02","title":"DOE Advanced Battery Initiative","deadline":"2025-05-01","amount":"$750,000","eligibility":"US universities conducting battery research","application_link":"https://www.energy.gov/grants/"}]
Saving the NSF Renewable Energy Grant to your personal grant tracker.

grant.title: NSF Renewable Energy Grant
grant.eligibility: US institutions with renewable energy focus

messages.content: Saving the DOE Advanced Battery Initiative to your personal grant tracker.

Here’s a timeline of the grants that match your lab’s focus for the next six months:

| Deadline | Grant Title | Amount | Application Link |
|----------|--------------|--------|-------------------|
| **2025-03-15** | NSF Renewable Energy Grant | $500,000 | [Apply](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/) |
| **2025-05-01** | DOE Advanced Battery Initiative | $750,000 | [Apply](https://www.energy.gov/grants/) |

I’ve stored both opportunities in your GrantScout dashboard (record IDs: `grant_rec_001`, `grant_rec_002`). Would you like me to schedule a weekly email reminder with any new matches, or perhaps generate a draft outline for one of these applications?
